title: The Cry from Beyond
description: What is it? Where does it come from? Blue Mountain has fallen, Winnowill has been exiled, and all seems quiet in the new Holt. But appearances are deceptive, for Strongbow the Archer's soul is torn by the terrible deed he has done, and little Suntop is tormented by a psychic plea for help that no one else can hear.
author: Wendy Pini
